author: Christopher Bevins

review: Simply fabulous!  Anyone that has prime should get this. I purchased the fire TV and the fire stick. I gave the fire stick to my daughter for Christmas. The cool thing is I can control both of them with my Kindle, which I got for Christmas last year.  With the FireTV app I can see what my daughters watching and I can control it which means while she's watching TV I can change fast-forward reinput all that different shows in the middle of what she's watching.  Also with the voice command I can put little messages on the TV in the middle of her show and for someone who is 14 and believes in ghosts well it makes for quite a comical experience. The controls the set up no buffering time the amount of apps and programming that you can use through this device is awesome I have had no problems with it whatsoever Pickanax every time and it does exactly what I ask it to do I highly recommend it.
